Name: OxyTorch Cutter Attachment
Description:
MUST BUY BASE MULTI-TOOL TO USE: "Pyro RYT Multi-Tool"

Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Multi-Tool Attachment
Class: Cutter

Transform Greycat's Pyro RYT Multi-Tool into a precision cutter with the OxyTorch attachment. Built to quickly and easily slice through appropriate materials, the OxyTorch harnesses the power of the multi-tool to deliver accurate cuts with clean edges, making it a convenient attachment ideal for both professionals and hobbyists.
